translations: n.牧牛工，牛仔；（美国西部影片中）牛仔；<英>奸商，不负责任的人；牛仔竞技表演者；有牛仔特质的人，（尤指）冒险莽撞的人

phrs.translation: n. 牛仔帽；宽边高呢帽

sentences.sentence: He shows up in jeans and cowboy boots.
sentences.translation: 他穿着牛仔裤和牛仔靴现身了。

sentences.sentence: He had sought work as a cowboy, rounding up cattle.
sentences.translation: 他曾经找过一份当牛仔的工作，负责看牛不让其失散。

sentences.sentence: Face it – you'll just have to take those cowboy boots back and ask for a refund.
sentences.translation: 面对现实吧–你不过是要把那些牛仔靴拿回去，要求退款。
